settings.title:
Our center offers training courses in different spheres, such as Buddhism 
teachings, meditation practices, yoga, concentration and so on.

settings.editor: We gather to make our commitment to become free from suffering, help people with their spiritual growth and provide a safe and friendly space for nurturing holistic well-being.

We are a Buddhism temple built in 1982 and we are at the service of the community. Come and visit with the monks, attend our special events or just spent a quite moment infront of our Buddha Statue you are going to experience an internal moment of peace and joy.
